mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Imprint from colophon, with date: Anno dñi. M.ccccc.xi. die. xxiiii. Iulii. [original]
Printed in red and black, within historiated borders. Initials painted gold on red and blue background. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: Capé. Unidentified monogram bookplate of DP. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas GOrdon, Gordon list, 410. [original]
